main.name: Keerthi Swaroop Satambakkam
main.description: Passionate about building scalable data platforms.
main.bio: My name is Keerthi Swaroop Satambakkam. I'm a skilled Data Engineer with expertise in Snowflake, Apache Airflow, and modern ETL/ELT workflows. I specialize in building scalable and efficient data pipelines.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

education.degree: Bachelor's in Computer Science and Engineering

work.title: Data Engineer
work.summary: Designed and optimized an AWS-based data warehouse, integrating multiple EHR systems to enhance healthcare data accessibility. Developed scalable ETL pipelines with Apache Airflow & AWS Glue, processing millions of patient records monthly. Improved query performance on Redshift and implemented real-time analytics with Tableau, accelerating healthcare insights. Leveraged Docker & Kubernetes for efficient deployments and resource optimization.

work.title: Data Analyst
work.summary: Developed a predictive credit scoring model using machine learning, improving loan approval accuracy. Designed and optimized real-time ETL workflows with Apache Airflow & Azure Data Factory, reducing processing latency. Built Power BI dashboards with real-time Kafka streams, enabling faster decision-making for credit risk analysis. Deployed scalable models on Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) and automated infrastructure provisioning with Terraform.

certifications.title: AWS Certified Data Engineer â€“ Associate

projects.title: YouTube Data Analysis
projects.description: AWS-based pipeline to analyze YouTube trending data using Glue, Lambda, and QuickSight.

projects.title: House Sales Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive Tableau dashboard visualizing King County house sales trends.

projects.title: Auto-Ingest Twitter to S3 & Snowflake
projects.description: Real-time tweet ingestion pipeline using AWS S3 and Snowflake.

projects.title: Twitter Airflow S3 Pipeline
projects.description: Twitter Data Pipeline using Apache Airflow, Tweepy, and S3.

projects.title: Banking Data Integration
projects.description: Enterprise data integration from Db2 Warehouse to Snowflake using IBM DataStage.

projects.title: Data Ingestion to Snowflake
projects.description: Demonstrates various ways to load data into Snowflake efficiently.

projects.title: F1 Real-Time Data Pipeline
projects.description: Real-time data pipeline that streams F1 2024 race data using FastF1,Kafka, S3,Snowflake using Airflow on AWS EC2.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Sonny Sangha must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
